item.title: Conversation
item.description: Just a little conversation About give me your picture On the cover of a magazine On the cover of a magazine Just a little conversation But how long it might take one? To get along with such thing? To get along with such thing? But everybody knows It’s easier to fall apart Just a little conversation About give me your picture On the cover of a magazine
